TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NextPreviousPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示欄位，該欄位顯示 控制項中可讓使用者逐頁查看資料的導覽控制項。

span.span: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control enable users to page through data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表的欄位，會顯示在瀏覽控制項控制項。The class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control. 這些巡覽控制項可以用於實作的控制項所顯示的資料進行分頁介面，例如控制項。These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 類別會提供按鈕，可讓使用者瀏覽資料的一頁的頁面中，一次，或跳到第一個或最後一頁的資料。The class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data. 您可以自訂的外觀物件使用屬性來設定按鈕的樣式。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the property to set the style of the buttons. 您也可以使用選擇顯示的按鈕類型的屬性。You can also use the property to choose the type of button that is displayed. 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 您可以隱藏物件藉由設定控制屬性設`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 您也可以隱藏個別的按鈕 （第一頁、 前一頁、 下一步 頁面上和最後一頁按鈕），藉由設定， ， ，以及屬性，以`false`。You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the , , , and properties to `false`. 控制項可讓您使用指定的每個按鈕的自訂文字， ， ，和屬性。The control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the , , , and properties. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，您必須提供 [] 按鈕將會顯示影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button. 您可以藉由設定來設定個別為每個按鈕的映像， ， ，和屬性。You can set images individually for each button by setting the , , , and properties. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，對應的文字屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 比方說，由所指定的文字屬性會顯示為第一頁影像按鈕的替代文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為工具提示。In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件中顯示的資料進行分頁控制項。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 您要將欄位加入 動態建立時，通常會運用這個建構函式控制項。This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created control. 若要新增以動態方式為物件控制項，建立新物件，設定其屬性，並將其加入的欄位集合控制項。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以動態方式加入的建構函式物件至控制項。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別，用來呈現瀏覽器上頁面巡覽區欄位的按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.

value.span: 用來呈現用戶端上頁面巡覽區欄位的按鈕之 CSS 類別。

span.span: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.

value.span: 預設值是空字串，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在頁面巡覽區欄位的按鈕的瀏覽器上呈現的 CSS 類別。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field. 這個屬性一律會呈現為類別屬性，不論瀏覽器。This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支援設定的 CSS 的瀏覽器上屬性沒有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定按鈕中的 CSS 類別物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to specify a CSS class for buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定哪一種按鈕會顯示在按鈕欄位的屬性。Use the property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field. 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 當設為`ButtonType.Image`，您必須設定要使用下表所示的屬性來顯示按鈕的影像。When is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||要為最後一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| 值屬性儲存在 viewstate。The value of the property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定映像按鈕會顯示在物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. summary.span: 取得或設定為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`而屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等等） 所支援的瀏覽器。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 當以外的其他屬性設定為值`ButtonType.Image`，將屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示中的第一頁 按鈕影像物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 預設值為 "First"。

span.span: The default is "First".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定要為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，則會顯示影像和屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate，它可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以自訂的文字中的頁面巡覽區欄位的第一頁按鈕控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the first-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 處理 控制項中發生的事件並執行適當的動作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the control and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是協助程式方法，以供方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 呼叫它來處理中發生的事件物件，其中一個按鈕控制項內按一下時。It is called to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法會檢查屬性中所包含的物件`e`參數，然後執行適當的動作。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出所提供的按鈕控制項並按一下按鈕時執行的動作。The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|動作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |第一頁First page||瀏覽至資料的第一頁。Navigates to the first page of data.| |前一頁Previous page||瀏覽至資料的前一頁。Navigates to the previous page of data.| |下一個頁面Next page||巡覽至下一頁資料。Navigates to the next page of data.| |最後一頁Last page||巡覽至最後一個資料頁。Navigates to the last page of data.|

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`而屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定最後一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等等） 所支援的瀏覽器。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 當以外的其他屬性設定為值`ButtonType.Image`，將屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示中的最後一頁 按鈕影像物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the last-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定為最後一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the last-page button.

value.span: 為最後一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the last-page button.

value.span: 預設值為 "Last"。

span.span: The default is "Last".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定要為最後一頁按鈕顯示的文字。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the last-page button. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，則會顯示影像和屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate，它可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來自訂 [呼叫器] 欄位中的最後一頁按鈕的文字控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the last-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 物件是否將停用的按鈕呈現為 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object.

value.span: 如果停用的按鈕呈現為 控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if disabled buttons are rendered as controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否停用的按鈕會呈現為藉由控制物件。Use the property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object. 按鈕會停用物件時無法執行與按鈕關聯的函式。The buttons are disabled by the object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed. 例如，當您在第一頁資料時，就會停用第一頁和 [上一頁] 按鈕。For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled. 根據預設，物件使用指定的控制項類型來呈現停用的按鈕屬性。By default, the object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the property. 它也會設定屬性來控制`false`。It also sets the property of the control to `false`. 當設定為`true`，則物件會使用来呈現已停用的按鈕控制項。When is set to `true`, the object uses the control to render the disabled buttons. 值屬性用來設定屬性控制項。The value of the property is used to set the property of the control. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

related.span: ListView Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否不分行空格 (HTML` `字元) 之間瀏覽控制項的呈現物件。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the object. 您可以設定至`false`如果您需要更充分掌控您要建立具有階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別的配置。You can set to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示第一頁按鈕是否顯示在 物件中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果第一頁按鈕顯示在 物件中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the first-page button is displayed in a object; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以顯示或隱藏的第一頁按鈕物件。Use the property to show or hide the first-page button of a object. 若要顯示的第一頁按鈕，將屬性設`true`。To show the first-page button, set the property to `true`. 這個屬性的值會儲存在 viewstate。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定第一頁按鈕應該會顯示。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that the first-page button should be displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
